StatementRule.statement_content: USE CASE Source code delivery OR Binary delivery

USE CASE Source code delivery OR Binary delivery
	YOU MUST Reference License text
	YOU MUST Search License acceptance
		ATTRIBUTE Reasonable
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Forward Copyright notices
		YOU MUST Forward Patent notice
		YOU MUST Forward Trademark notice
		YOU MUST Forward License notice
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice
		YOU MUST NOT Promote
		IF Modified work Under Original license
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Include Source code Of Modified work
					ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
			OR
				YOU MUST Provide Delayed source code delivery Of Modified work
					ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
					ATTRIBUTE Via Internet
					ATTRIBUTE No profit
					ATTRIBUTE Duration As long as distributed
				YOU MUST Reference Source code
					ATTRIBUTE Below Copyright notice
PATENT HINTS Yes

USE CASE Source code delivery OR Binary delivery
	YOU MUST Reference License text
	YOU MUST Search License acceptance
		ATTRIBUTE Reasonable
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Forward Copyright notices
		YOU MUST Forward Patent notice
		YOU MUST Forward Trademark notice
		YOU MUST Forward License notice
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice
		YOU MUST NOT Promote
		IF Modified work Under Original license
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Include Source code Of Modified work
					ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
			OR
				YOU MUST Provide Delayed source code delivery Of Modified work
					ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
					ATTRIBUTE Via Internet
					ATTRIBUTE No profit
					ATTRIBUTE Duration As long as distributed
				YOU MUST Reference Source code
					ATTRIBUTE Below Copyright notice
PATENT HINTS Yes

USE CASE Source code delivery OR Binary delivery OR Network service
	YOU MUST Reference License text
	YOU MUST Search License acceptance
		ATTRIBUTE Reasonable
	IF License change
		YOU MUST Use Compatible license
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Forward Copyright notices
		YOU MUST Forward Patent notice
		YOU MUST Forward Trademark notice
		YOU MUST Forward License notice
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice
		YOU MUST NOT Promote
		IF Modified work Under Original license
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Include Source code Of Modified work
					ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
			OR
				YOU MUST Provide Delayed source code delivery Of Modified work
					ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
					ATTRIBUTE Via Internet
					ATTRIBUTE No profit
					ATTRIBUTE Duration As long as distributed
PATENT HINTS Yes

USE CASE Source code delivery
	YOU MUST Provide Copyright notice
		ATTRIBUTE Highlighted
		ATTRIBUTE Appropriately
	YOU MUST NOT Modify License notices
	YOU MUST NOT Modify Warranty disclaimer
	YOU MUST Provide License text
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice
		YOU MUST Provide Modification date
		YOU MUST Grant License
			ATTRIBUTE Original license
		IF Interactive AND Displaying License announcement
			YOU MUST Display Appropriate legal notices
		IF Non-permissive additional terms Added
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Include Non-permissive additional terms In Source code
			OR
				YOU MUST Reference Non-permissive additional terms In Source code
	YOU MUST NOT Restrict Granted rights
		EXCEPT IF Permitted Non-permissive additional terms
	YOU MUST NOT Litigate Circumvention
USE CASE Binary delivery
	YOU MUST Provide Copyright notice
		ATTRIBUTE Highlighted
		ATTRIBUTE Appropriately
	YOU MUST NOT Modify License notices
	YOU MUST NOT Modify Warranty disclaimer
	YOU MUST Provide License text
		IF Non-permissive additional terms
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Include Non-permissive additional terms In Source code
			OR
				YOU MUST Reference Non-permissive additional terms In Source code
			YOU MUST Provide Non-permissive additional terms
	YOU MUST Provide Source code
		ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
		ATTRIBUTE Documented format
		ATTRIBUTE Including Tool chain information
	IF Binary delivery On Customary medium OR Installed
		EITHER
			YOU MUST Include Source code
				ATTRIBUTE Customary medium
		OR
			YOU MUST Provide Delayed source code delivery
			YOU MUST Provide Written offer
				ATTRIBUTE Duration At least 3 years
				ATTRIBUTE Duration As long as product is supported
				ATTRIBUTE Source code delivery
					EITHER
						ATTRIBUTE Customary medium
						ATTRIBUTE No profit
					OR
						ATTRIBUTE Via Internet
						ATTRIBUTE No charge
	IF Binary delivery Via Internet
		YOU MUST Provide Source code
			ATTRIBUTE Via Internet
			ATTRIBUTE Duration As long as needed
			IF Source code On same server
				ATTRIBUTE No charge
			IF Source code On other server
				ATTRIBUTE Equivalent
				YOU MUST Reference Source code
	IF Binary delivery Via peer-to-peer transmission
		YOU MUST Reference Source code
			ATTRIBUTE No charge
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice
		YOU MUST Provide Modification date
		YOU MUST Grant License
			ATTRIBUTE Original license
		IF Interactive AND Displaying License announcement
			YOU MUST Display Appropriate legal notices
		IF Non-permissive additional terms Added
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Include Non-permissive additional terms In Source code
					ATTRIBUTE With Source code delivery
			OR
				YOU MUST Reference Non-permissive additional terms In Source code
					ATTRIBUTE With Source code delivery
	IF User product
		YOU MUST Provide Installation information
			EXCEPT IF Installation Is NOT Feasible
	YOU MUST NOT Restrict Granted rights
		EXCEPT IF Permitted Non-permissive additional terms
	YOU MUST NOT Litigate Circumvention
USE CASE Network service
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Provide Source code
			ATTRIBUTE Via Internet
			ATTRIBUTE No charges
			ATTRIBUTE Customary method

COPYLEFT CLAUSE Yes

USE CASE Source code delivery
	YOU MUST Forward Copyright notices
	YOU MUST Forward License text
	YOU MUST Forward Warranty disclaimer
	YOU MUST Credit Verbatim "This product includes software developed by the Apache Group for use in the Apache HTTP server project (http://www.apache.org/)."
	IF Advertisement
		YOU MUST Credit Verbatim In Advertisement "This product includes software developed by the Apache Group for use in the Apache HTTP server project (http://www.apache.org/)."
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST NOT Promote using "Apache Server" or "Apache Group"
		YOU MUST NOT Use "Apache" In Product name
USE CASE Binary delivery
	YOU MUST Provide Copyright notices In Documentation OR Distribution material
	YOU MUST Provide License text In Documentation OR Distribution material
	YOU MUST Provide Warranty disclaimer In Documentation OR Distribution material
	YOU MUST Credit Verbatim "This product includes software developed by the Apache Group for use in the Apache HTTP server project (http://www.apache.org/)."
	IF Advertisement
		YOU MUST Credit Verbatim In Advertisement "This product includes software developed by the Apache Group for use in the Apache HTTP server project (http://www.apache.org/)."
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST NOT Promote using "Apache Server" or "Apache Group"
		YOU MUST NOT Use "Apache" In Product name

USE CASE Source code delivery
	YOU MUST Forward Copyright notices
	YOU MUST Forward License text
	YOU MUST Forward Warranty disclaimer
	IF Documentation
		YOU MUST Credit Verbatim In Documentation "This product includes software developed by the Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/)."
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST NOT Promote using "Apache" or "Apache Software Foundation"
		YOU MUST NOT Use "Apache" [ex. "Jakarta," "Apache," or "Apache Commons,"] In Product name
USE CASE Binary delivery
	IF Documentation
		YOU MUST Credit Verbatim In Documentation "This product includes software developed by the Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/)."
	YOU MUST Provide Copyright notices In Documentation OR Distribution material
	YOU MUST Provide License text In Documentation OR Distribution material
	YOU MUST Provide Warranty disclaimer In Documentation OR Distribution material
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST NOT Promote using "Apache" or "Apache Software Foundation"
		YOU MUST NOT Use "Apache" [ex. "Jakarta," "Apache," or "Apache Commons,"] In Product name

USE CASE Source code delivery
	YOU MUST Provide License text
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice
		YOU MUST Forward Copyright notices
		YOU MUST Forward Patent notices
		YOU MUST Forward Trademark notices
		YOU MUST Forward Attribution notices
		IF Work Includes File "NOTICE"
			YOU MUST Delete Irrelevant parts
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Provide File "NOTICE"
			OR
				YOU MUST Provide File "NOTICE" In Source code
			OR
				YOU MUST Provide File "NOTICE" In Documentation
			OR
				YOU MUST Display File "NOTICE"
	IF Service offerings
		YOU MUST Indemnify Other contributors
USE CASE Binary delivery
	YOU MUST Provide License text
	IF Software modification
		IF Work Includes File "NOTICE"
			YOU MUST Delete Irrelevant parts
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Provide File "NOTICE"
			OR
				YOU MUST Provide File "NOTICE" In Source code
			OR
				YOU MUST Provide File "NOTICE" In Documentation
			OR
				YOU MUST Display File "NOTICE"
	IF Service offerings
		YOU MUST Indemnify Other contributors
PATENT HINTS Yes

USE CASE Source code delivery
	YOU MUST Provide Copyright notices
	YOU MUST Provide Warranty disclaimer
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice In Source code
		YOU MUST Provide Modification report In Source code
		YOU MUST Provide Modification date In Source code
		EITHER
			YOU MUST Publish Modification
			YOU MUST Grant License
				EITHER
					ATTRIBUTE Public domain
				OR
					ATTRIBUTE No profit
					ATTRIBUTE Original license
		OR
			YOU MUST Provide Source code Of Modified work
				ATTRIBUTE To Copyright holder Of Original work
				ATTRIBUTE Compatible license
		OR
			YOU MUST Rename Target binary
			YOU MUST Provide Original work
			YOU MUST Provide Modification report
	YOU MUST NOT Require License fee
	YOU MUST NOT Promote
USE CASE Binary delivery
	YOU MUST Provide Original work
	YOU MUST Reference Original work In Distribution material
	IF Software modification
		EITHER
			YOU MUST Provide Source code
				ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
		OR
			YOU MUST Provide Original work As Binary delivery
			YOU MUST Rename Modified work
			YOU MUST Provide Modification report In Distribution material
			YOU MUST Reference Original work In Distribution material
	IF Distributed With Other works
		YOU MUST NOT Misrepresent Authorship
	YOU MUST NOT Require License fee
	YOU MUST NOT Promote

USE CASE Source code delivery
	YOU MUST Provide Copyright notices
	YOU MUST Provide Warranty disclaimer
	IF Software modification
		YOU MUST Provide Modification notice In Source code
		YOU MUST Provide Modification report In Source code
		YOU MUST Provide Modification date In Source code
		EITHER
			YOU MUST Publish Modification
			YOU MUST Grant License
				EITHER
					ATTRIBUTE Public domain
				OR
					ATTRIBUTE No profit
					ATTRIBUTE Original license
		OR

				ATTRIBUTE To Copyright holder Of Original work
				ATTRIBUTE Compatible license
		OR

			YOU MUST Provide Original work
			YOU MUST Provide Modification report
	YOU MUST NOT Require License fee
	YOU MUST NOT Promote
USE CASE Binary delivery
	IF Software modification
		EITHER
			YOU MUST Provide Original work
			YOU MUST Reference Original work In Distribution material
		OR
			YOU MUST Provide Source code
				ATTRIBUTE Machine-readable
		OR
			YOU MUST Rename Modified work
			YOU MUST Provide Modification report In Distribution material
			YOU MUST Reference Original work In Distribution material
	IF Distributed With Other works
		YOU MUST NOT Misrepresent Authorship
	YOU MUST NOT Require License fee

USE CASE Source code delivery
	YOU MUST Provide Copyright notices
	YOU MUST Provide Warranty disclaimer
	IF Software modification
		EXCEPT IF Provided By Copyright holder
		YOU MUST Provide Modification report
		EITHER
			YOU MUST Provide Source code Of Modified work
				ATTRIBUTE To Copyright holder Of Original work
				ATTRIBUTE Original license
		OR
			YOU MUST NOT Impede Installation Of Original work
			YOU MUST NOT Impede Running Original work
			YOU MUST Rename Modified work
		OR
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Use Original license
			OR
				YOU MUST Use Strong copyleft license
	YOU MUST NOT Require License fee
USE CASE Binary delivery
	YOU MUST Reference Source code
		IF Reference Expires
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Provide Reference On Request
					ATTRIBUTE Within 30 days
			OR
				YOU MUST End Binary delivery
					ATTRIBUTE Within 30 days
	IF Software modification
		EXCEPT IF Provided By Copyright holder
		YOU MUST Provide Modification report
		EITHER
			YOU MUST Provide Source code Of Modified work
				ATTRIBUTE To Copyright holder Of Original work
				ATTRIBUTE Original license
		OR
			YOU MUST NOT Impede Installation Of Original work
			YOU MUST NOT Impede Running Original work
			YOU MUST Rename Modified work
		OR
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Use Original license
			OR
				YOU MUST Use Strong copyleft license
	IF Linked work
		EITHER
			YOU MUST NOT Provide Interface To Work
		OR
			YOU MUST Provide Modification report
			EITHER
				YOU MUST Provide Source code Of Modified work
					ATTRIBUTE To Copyright holder Of Original work
					ATTRIBUTE Original license
			OR
				YOU MUST NOT Impede Installation Of Original work
				YOU MUST NOT Impede Running Original work
				YOU MUST Rename Modified work
			OR
				EITHER
					YOU MUST Use Original license
				OR
					YOU MUST Use Strong copyleft license
	YOU MUST NOT Require License fee
PATENT HINTS Yes
